channel.title: Projects on Azmi's Portfolio Website
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Azmi's Portfolio Website

item.title: Project 1: Lets play around with some Stocks!
item.description: Lets take a look at the NYSE #Downloading the data we need nyse <- read_csv(here::here("data","nyse.csv")) Lets see how the NYSE is made up #Grouping the companies in the NYSE by sector companies_per_sector <- nyse %>% group_by(sector) %>% summarise(count=count(sector)) %>% arrange(desc(count)) #Lets see what it looks like in a bar graph bar <- companies_per_sector %>% ggplot(aes(y=reorder(sector,count),x=count))+ geom_col()+ labs(y="",x="# of Companies",title="Companies in the NYSE")+ theme_economist_white() bar Now lets look at the Dow Jones Industrial Aveareg (DJIA) djia_url <- "https://en.
